This personal link name already exists, please enter a different ID.

Your personal link name is used to identify your meeting URL (e.g. https://zoom.us/my/personal_link_name). It must be 5 to 40 characters. It must start with a letter and can contain only letters(a-z), numbers(0-9), and periods(\".\").

You need to have colleagues in your zoom account so you can add them to your company contacts. Please click Configure Account to add colleagues.
